name: MyCarpentry
details: This is a carpentry tool manufacurer website. in here you can create account. Add product to your order list , you can continue pay for them or you can delete them. Butafter payment you can not delete the product from your order list. If you are an admin, you can make a user admin. You can see how many products the users placed. And evenyou can see both user and products list. you can remove an unpaid item as your will.You can add a new item too.

name: Laptop Mania
details: In this project you can update item quantity. You can create an account either with email or google account and after logged in more functionality like, my items, manage items etc will be visible on header section

name: Pixieco
details: user can SignUp/Signin with google and github. Without signing in user can not access all the services of this site. This is a Single Page Application. And...Responsive for mobile and laptop

name: Proxima Inc.
details: This site have home route with customer reviews. Have 404 error route for not existing route. Used Rechart to show annual and monthly revenue. Responsive for mobile and laptop
